Good day! Thank you for your visit and your feedback. We regret that your visit was overshadowed by a number of unpleasant moments: from tasteless borscht to the closing time of the restaurant. Unfortunately, the waitress Oksana did not work on Monday, and we would be grateful for the name of the waiter who served you, so that such situations would not take place in the future. We would be particularly grateful to you if you could tell where exactly abroad in schools Ukrainian borscht, our Ukrainian national dish, is prepared. It is such a rarity to meet this dish abroad, especially since you rated it as "2/5, something like a school cafeteria".
